title: build with bun doesn't return version
author: luxus

comments.body:
The issue is how `bun` installs global packages. mcp-hub looks for package.json to resolve version currently. In bun the symlinking and installation of global node_modules is little tricky. Will be fixed soon. 

Thank you.
yes it works, but as in the commit its hardcoded.. i guess this should stay open :D
This is now solved with the build step.

satisfaction_conditions: The --version command should return the actual package version when installed with Bun
The package should properly identify its version when installed through alternative package managers
The version detection should work without hardcoding
The package should function correctly for its primary purpose even when installed with Bun
